title: "Research & Publications"
listing:
  # LISTING 1: The Visual Gallery (Points to the .qmd files)
  - id: gallery
    contents: "featured/*/*.qmd"
    type: default
    fields: [image, title, description, date]
    sort: "date desc"
    filter-ui: true
    page-size: 6   # Pagination (so many cards don't clutter the page)
    max-description-length: 175

  # LISTING 2: The Full Reference List (Points to the .yml data)
  - id: full-list
    contents: full_pubs.yml
    type: table
    fields: [date, title, author, publication]
    field-display-names: 
      publication: "Journal/Conference"
    sort: "date desc"
    filter-ui: true   # Adds a search bar for the full list
    page-size: 10     # Pagination (so 100 papers don't clutter the page)
